content: Credit Card DBS DBS Multiplier Asked by Max TrimbleAsked on 01 Sep 2019Which credit card should I pair together with my DBS Everyday Card?Hi, I have just started working and have made a DBS Multiplier account and DBS Everyday Card to maximize the interest for my money in the multiplier account. Is there a need or is there another credit card I could use to sort of use it together with the first card mentioned?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

PatLevel 4. ProdigyAnswered on 02 Sep 2019Depends on your expenditure.If you are not much of a spender, the Everyday is sufficient. Even a charge of $1 to this card gets you your additional interest. Read their partner offers to max out the rebates that you can get.
If you spend and like to travel, you can consider the Altitude card but tbh I only recommend it if your annual spending is $25k a year so you can get the annual fee waiver.0 comments1
